help.description: Get help with using the reminder bot
help.title: 🤖 Reminder Bot Help
help.intro: I can help you create and manage reminders for yourself and others!

timezoneSupport.line1: Set your timezone with `/timezone` for better time parsing.
timezoneSupport.line2: Supported: UTC, America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Tokyo, etc.
timezoneSupport.line3: All reminders are processed in UTC but displayed in your timezone.

remindingOthers.line2: They'll get notified when the reminder triggers.
remindingOthers.line3: Both you and they can see the reminder in `/reminders`.

help.footer: Need more help? Ask a human!
